content:
I'm being tasked to write an IG Proposal, which apparently is officially required before writing an IG. Where is the relevant information located? I checked
https://hl7-fhir.github.io/iglist.html
but it doesn't seem to cover "proposals". Also, are there specific things to keep in mind given the IG infrastructure overhaul? Thanks!
@Lloyd McKenzie , are there examples of proposals somewhere? I mean groups that have already gone through creating a proposal and already have an official IG. Thanks!

@Lloyd McKenzie , I apologize for having to bother you again. It seems that I have to be a User to edit the Wiki. However, I cannot find how to register. The log in page doesn't seem to help:
http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=Special:UserLogin&returnto=HL7Wiki%3AHelp
Should I send en email to webmaster@hl7.org or is there a more efficient way? Thank you very much.

Hi @Gaston Fiore. We had a major hack about 4 months ago and it looks like they haven't enabled web-based sign-up again yet. Just send an email to webmaster@hl7.org describing what you want to do and she'll set up an account for you.
